duties_responsibilities.duty: Process customer financial transactions, open new accounts, and prepare required documents.
Answer inquiries and provide information in person, by telephone, and by mail on various accounts and bank services.
Assist in achieving branch sales goals by actively selling bank products and promoting new business.
Develop and expand client relationships by identifying client needs and cross-selling bank products.
Balance cash drawer, service customer accounts, and execute account servicing requests.
Execute changes of address, ATM claims, and all other account servicing requests.
Provide exceptional customer experience by utilizing Bank service standards.
Perform special projects and additional duties as required.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent. Retail sales, customer service, cash handling experience preferred.

OR Minimum of one (1) year of experience in a process-driven role handling credit or financial transactions such as; billing analyst at a medical facility, auto dealership, insurance practice or other comparable experience.
Computer literate with general proficiency in an application such as; billing, invoicing, cash management or other workflow application.
Customer service focused, detail oriented, demonstrated multitasking skills, strong communication skills, critical thinking skills, ability to work well in a team environment.
